data.title: 'Famous Number 18' Signed Jersey
data.meta_description: Essendon Bombers – ‘Famous Number 18’ Signed Jersey Paul Van Der Haar (200+ games, 278 goals, 2 x runner-up Best and Fairest, 49 brownlow votes), Matthew Lloyd (270 games, 926 goals, 5 x All Australian Selections, 12 x Leading Goal Kicker, Captain 2006-2009) and Michael Hurley (current number 18) (#5 AFL Draft Pick 2008, 77 […]
data.text:
Description

Essendon Bombers – ‘Famous Number 18’ Signed Jersey

Paul Van Der Haar (200+ games, 278 goals, 2 x runner-up Best and Fairest, 49 brownlow votes), Matthew Lloyd (270 games, 926 goals, 5 x All Australian Selections, 12 x Leading Goal Kicker, Captain 2006-2009) and Michael Hurley (current number 18) (#5 AFL Draft Pick 2008, 77 current games, 94 goals, NAB rising star nominee 2009 and 2010) have worn the number 18 jumper with pride and it’s famous legacy will continue through Hurley and whoever in the future has the privilege to don the black and red number 18 jersey.

Each ‘Famous Number 18’ Jersey comes;

Replica Essendon No.18 Guernsey signed by Paul Van Der Haar, Matthew Lloyd and Michael Hurley

Limited to 118 editions only

Officially licensed by the Australian Football League

Authenticated by the AFL Players’ Association

Accompanied by a Certificate of Authenticity

Presented in a deluxe timber frame; also available in boxed format

Also available in a deluxe presentation box

Order online or call us on (02)98995696 or purchase instore today

Lay-by available over 6 months
